channel.title: Help on my server! Rep++
channel.description: Hi guys i've been having a problem on my server when i attack an npc it laggs for like 5 secs then hits this also happens when i use weapon specs. How might i be able to fix this?

item.title: Help on my server! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“chris805, post:1, topic:368947”]Hi guys i’ve been having a problem on my server when i attack an npc it laggs for like 5 secs then hits this also happens when i use weapon specs. How might i be able to fix this?[/quote]Is there any attack delay, or any other delay that’s being processed? Because a delay can effect for two or more things, and one of them could be attacking an npc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on my server! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

clean out ure process if ure using a delta base which you most likely are since thats what like 70% of servers are. also clean up ure computer, if ure trying to run a server off a dinosaur computer its gona lag a storm.

Read full topic
